body_html: Yes, I have. If I set padding as 6 arguments and kernel as 3 arguments, it will meet the same errors as I reported. And I think it can be explained as when we do conv and deconv, padding is balanced, e.g. left pad is equal to right pad.
body_text: Yes, I have. If I set padding as 6 arguments and kernel as 3 arguments, it will meet the same errors as I reported. And I think it can be explained as when we do conv and deconv, padding is balanced, e.g. left pad is equal to right pad.
body: Yes, I have. If I set padding as 6 arguments and kernel as 3 arguments, it will meet the same errors as I reported. And I think it can be explained as when we do conv and deconv, padding is balanced, e.g. left pad is equal to right pad.
